sentence.text: One other element however was essential to provide the dynamic for righteous action by evangelicals ; certainty of God 's government was combined with conviction of free human will and agency .
Four centuries earlier Socrates at Athens observed that a really righteous person would be so unacceptable to human society that he would be subjected to every humiliation and crucified .
I tell you the same way , there will be more joy in heaven over one sinner who repents , than over ninety nine righteous persons who need no repentance .
If we confess our sins he is faithful and righteous to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
It is not that people should be righteous in the expectation of some reward but rather they should behave righteously because of an inherent desire to do so .
The family of Jesus is not made up of people who are righteous in everything , peaceful whatever happens , joyful at every moment .
Mary Finnigan : ` We were extremely righteous about our drugs in those days .
Are we righteous by believing on the Lord Jesus Christ and His finished work ?

Tixier-Vignancour declined to be described as ` anti-semitic " ( he once sued Sam White of the Evening Standard for calling him this ) but he was in no danger of winning a ` righteous gentile " award .
Righteous anger loosened Kathleen 's tongue .
These reasons do not justify the righteous role which they assign to the avenging vigilante .
We stand either not guilty or condemned before a righteous God and are never excused or condemned because our actions fall above or below group expectations .
This week you will vote for the next government , and I shall not be around to ventilate , on your behalf , your righteous rage at the disgusting results of your electoral behaviour .
Uhtred after all was an Englishman , only one of a list of would-be savers of righteous pagans from the British Isles .
` Cadet d'Arquebus ! " screamed the Chaplain , suffused with a righteous rage which he may or may not have been simulating .
We are called to be righteous members of His kingdom , looking to our heavenly King , and being ready to proclaim the Good News by word and deed .
I 'm not stupid enough to let myself get carried away by righteous anger and reveal my presence .
So what on earth is Jesus meaning here , when he talks about righteous people not needing to repent ?
All comes from the Bible , which is offered to them as proof of the truth of what they are told , and gives them the impression that both extremes of behaviour are correct and righteous .
Reformers in 1885 had no doubt that their cause was righteous : a crusade against ` a dark and cruel wrong " .
Surely this kind of action is not righteous .
The married women in the room looked righteous as though they had made the unselfish decision .
